etymology.description: Depicts a kneeling person to indicate a specific position or joint-like movement.
etymology.interpretation: The character 㔾(㔾) (jié, "joint") visually represents a kneeling figure, symbolizing a position where components of a limb (like joints) come into contact or bend.

examples.chinese: 运动员练习跳跃时(運動員練習跳躍時)，他的膝盖㔾承受巨大压力(他的膝蓋節承受巨大壓力)。
examples.pinyin: Yùndòngyuán liànxí tiàoyuè shí, tā de xīgài jié chéngshòu jùdà yālì.
examples.english: When the athlete practices jumping, the joint in his knee bears tremendous pressure.

examples.chinese: 机器人关节的㔾设计精密(機器人關節的節設計精密)，确保动作流畅(確保動作流暢)。
examples.pinyin: Jīqìrén guānjié de jié shèjì jīngmì, quèbǎo dòngzuò liúchàng.
examples.english: The joint in the robot's mechanism is precisely designed to ensure smooth movements.
